text: Ara tini'i se'ijana yini srsti karechena bagana -- maca-bamdhano o maca-bihina, ara khejura gacha, ara sasyaksetra yara rakama- rakamera sbada, ara jalapa'i o dalima -- eka rakamera o sadrsyabihina. Se-sabera phala kha'o yakhana ta phala dhare, ara ora hak pradana karo phasala tolara dine, ara apacaya karo na. Nihsandeha tini apacayakaridera bhalobasena na.
